languages.text: "Безумцы, желающие сломать многовековые устои нашего великого Дома, так бережно взращиваемые предыдущим {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатором{/g} — Тисифоной Орселлио. Они считают век ее правления тиранией, а нашу священнейшую реликвию — проклятием, и желают ее уничтожить. Глупцы! Вместе с Атласом в небытие канет весь Дом Орселлио!"

traits.locale_text: "Безумцы, желающие сломать многовековые устои нашего великого Дома, так бережно взращиваемые предыдущим {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатором{/g} — Тисифоной Орселлио. Они считают век ее правления тиранией, а нашу священнейшую реликвию — проклятием, и желают ее уничтожить. Глупцы! Вместе с Атласом в небытие канет весь Дом Орселлио!"

languages.text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"
languages.original_text: "Безумцы, желающие сломать многовековые устои нашего великого Дома, так бережно взращиваемые предыдущим {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатором{/g} — Тисифоной Орселлио. Они считают век ее правления тиранией, а нашу священнейшую реликвию — проклятием, и желают ее уничтожить. Глупцы! Вместе с Атласом в небытие канет весь Дом Орселлио!"

traits.locale_text: "The madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, our most sacred relic — a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

"The madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, our most sacred relic — a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

"They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

"They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

languages.text: “他们是一群疯子，打算破坏我们伟大家族数百年来的传统。这些传统都是我们前任{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥赛罗精心制定的。那群疯子认为她的统治是暴政，认为我们家族最神圣的圣物是必须消灭的诅咒。如果圣仪真的遭到了摧毁，那整个奥赛罗家族都会陷入湮灭！”
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: “他们是一群疯子，打算破坏我们伟大家族数百年来的传统。这些传统都是我们前任{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥塞罗精心制定的。那群疯子认为她的统治是暴政，认为我们家族最神圣的圣物是必须消灭的诅咒。如果圣仪真的遭到了摧毁，那整个奥塞罗家族都会陷入湮灭！”

languages.text: «Son lunáticos que buscan destruir las tradiciones seculares de nuestra gran casa, cuidadas por la anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio. Creen que el siglo durante el que nos gobernó fue una era de tiranía y que nuestra reliquia más sagrada es una maldición que debe ser destruida. ¡Mentecatos! Si el Atlas fuera destruido, ¡la casa Orsellio caería en el olvido poco después!».
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: «Son lunáticos que buscan destruir las tradiciones seculares de nuestra gran casa, cuidadas por la anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio. Creen que el siglo durante el que nos gobernó fue una era de tiranía y que nuestra reliquia más sagrada es una maldición que debe ser destruida. ¡Mentecatos! Si el Atlas fuera destruido, ¡la casa Orsellio caería en el olvido poco después!».

languages.text: 「彼らは、先代{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}、ティシフォン・オーセリオが大切に育んできた、我が偉大な家の何世紀にもわたる伝統を破壊しようとする狂人だ。彼らは彼女の支配の世紀を専制政治とみなし、最も神聖な遺物を破壊すべき呪いとみなしている。愚か者め！アトラスが破壊されれば、オーセリオ家全体が忘却の彼方へ追いやられるというのに！」
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは、先代{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}、ティシフォン・オーセリオが大切に育んできた、我が偉大な家の何世紀にもわたる伝統を破壊しようとする狂人だ。彼らは彼女の支配の世紀を専制政治とみなし、最も神聖な遺物を破壊すべき呪いとみなしている。愚か者め！アトラスが破壊されれば、オーセリオ家全体が忘却の彼方へ追いやられるというのに！」

languages.text: "Das sind Wahnsinnige, die die jahrhundertealten Traditionen unseres großen Hauses zerstören wollen, die die frühere {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio so sorgsam bewahrt hat. Sie betrachten das Jahrhundert ihrer Herrschaft als Tyrannei und unser heiligstes Relikt als Fluch, der vernichtet werden muss. Narren! Würde der Atlas zerstört, würde ihm das gesamte Haus Orsellio in die Vergessenheit folgen!"
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: "Das sind Wahnsinnige, die die jahrhundertealten Traditionen unseres großen Hauses zerstören wollen, die die frühere {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio so sorgsam bewahrt hat. Sie betrachten das Jahrhundert ihrer Herrschaft als Tyrannei und unser heiligstes Relikt als Fluch, der vernichtet werden muss. Narren! Würde der Atlas zerstört, würde ihm das gesamte Haus Orsellio in die Vergessenheit folgen!"

languages.text: « Ce sont des fous, des fanatiques qui cherchent à détruire les traditions millénaires de notre grande maison perpétuées par la précédente {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, qui a régné pendant plus d'un siècle. À leurs yeux, elle n'était rien de moins qu'un tyran, et notre relique sacrée est une malédiction qui doit absolument être détruite. Les ignorants ! Si l'Atlas venait à être détruit, toute la maison Orsellio sombrerait dans le néant ! »
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des fous, des fanatiques qui cherchent à détruire les traditions millénaires de notre grande maison perpétuées par la précédente {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, Tisiphone Orsellio, qui a régné pendant plus d'un siècle. À leurs yeux, elle n'était rien de moins qu'un tyran, et notre relique sacrée est une malédiction qui doit absolument être détruite. Les ignorants ! Si l'Atlas venait à être détruit, toute la maison Orsellio sombrerait dans le néant ! »

languages.text: "Ulu Hanemizin yüzyıllardır süregelen ve önceki {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio tarafından dikkatle korunan geleneklerini yok etmeyi amaçlayan delirmiş şahıslar. Onun yüzyıl süren hükümdarlığını bir tiranlık, en kutsal yadigârımızı ise yok edilmesi gereken bir lanet olarak görüyorlar. Sersemler! Atlas yok edilirse tüm Orsellio Hanesi de onun peşinden yok olur!"
languages.original_text: "They are madmen who seek to destroy the centuries-old traditions of our great House, so carefully nurtured by the previous {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. They deem the century of her rule a tyranny, and our most sacred relic a curse that must be destroyed. Fools! If the Atlas were to be destroyed, the whole of House Orsellio would follow it into oblivion!"

traits.locale_text: "Ulu Hane'mizin yüzyıllardır süregelen ve önceki {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio tarafından dikkatle korunan geleneklerini yok etmeyi amaçlayan delirmiş kişiler. Onun yüzyıl süren hükümdarlığını bir tiranlık, en kutsal yadigârımızı ise yok edilmesi gereken bir lanet olarak görüyorlar. Sersemler! Eğer Atlas yok edilirse, tüm Orsellio Hanesi de onun peşinden yok olur!"
